title: Lorry falls off Dehiwala Fly-Over
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Vehicular movement was disrupted due to an accident on the Dehiwala flyover on Wednesday (30) morning.
The accident had taken place at around 3.30 this morning when a lorry traveling from Moratuwa to Colombo had collided with the security fence of the flyover and fell on to the road below.
